descriptionHtml:
V1.0

Extension for Riverwood. Adds more details to Riverwood, the river and surrounding forests, between riverwood and lake ilialta. Plants, including trees, flowers, ferns; Rocks; Animals (Goats,Cows,Chickens);Grass on emtpy Spaces (can be combined with More Grass Mod, or Glorious Grass Mod);Lanterns on Streets, Buildings. Every Object has been logically placed and sized, not just copy/paste. No changes/modifications on buildings, except ferns,lanterns. No Changes on NPC\'s and their paths. 
Screenshots show before/after and include the following third party mods (use at your own taste): 
-Bethesda Hi-Res DLC Optimized Mod
-More Grass Mod
-Glorious Grass Mod
-Water Redux Mod
-FXAA Injector (Sharpness,Brightness,Aperture)

This mod is not compatible with Mods, which change Architecture or the Layout of Riverwood and fits best on a Original RIverwood, extended with above mentioned Grass Mods.

This is a WIP Mod, where i plan to add more things in the future. my next mod will be covering Lake Ilialta. Enjoy it!

V1.1
Added more:

-Trees, plants, grass. 
-Logs on the island of Riverwood, because Riverwood has a sawmill. 
-Mushrooms
-Dead Trees in forests near Riverwood
-Tree Stumps

V1.2
Added/Changed:

-Stable for Goats outside Riverwood
-Rockery with Beautiful flowers
-Tuned Waterfalls (more wave froth, better animated, some trees and stones)

V1.3
Added/Changed:
-Ivy on Riverwood Bridge
-Valley heading towards Whiterun: much more trees along the River, Flowers, Ferns



Walk around and look closely.


Please feel free and share your comments, ideas and critics.

Also take a look @ my other mod: Lake Inialta Expanded V1.2

It fits to this mod, as it expands the upper region from the First Waterfall near Riverwood into the Lake Area of Inialta.
author: beachboy1969
